metadata.title: CVE-2021-39923 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Large loop in the PNRP dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.9 and 3.2.0 to3.2.17 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capturefile

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39923` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.6.7-1
libwireshark17t64 - 3.6.7-1
libwiretap14t64 - 3.6.7-1
libwsutil15t64 - 3.6.7-1
tshark - 3.6.7-1
wireshark - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-common - 3.6.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.7-1').
